Hi..just queued the Spaghetti Western TRILOGY.Finished the first one the good the bad and the ugly..but by default its playing in spanish..if i use VLC feature i can play in english but is there a to shut off the spanish keeping in my mind i would eventually be playing it through hard drive players in my HDTV..also in media player you can here spanish n english both which is quite odd n irritating.I hope the other two r not same in the trilogy.
The first audio track is Russian; the second is English. Select audio #2. Install CCCP.
When I finish it, I'm gonna say if it's good or no, but thanks indeed. I'm a great fan of these movie, always wanted to watch 'em at high quality.

Thank you heaps for this high quality encode.

Sorry that some people buy a computer and then think they know everything about it then go off at people giving them free torrents because they can't figure out something as simple as playing a video and switching audio.

I just want to know one thing, why the fuck do all the idiots flock to VLC?

But once again, thanks for this brilliant torrent.
